scripts.local-test-prepare-existing-assets: cd bruno/puris-integration-test && bru run --tags share-enablement-services --exclude-tags admin --env local
scripts.local-test: cd bruno/puris-integration-test && bru run --exclude-tags admin,share-enablement-services --env local
scripts.int-test-prepare-existing-assets: cd bruno/puris-integration-test && bru run --tags share-enablement-services --exclude-tags admin --env INT
scripts.int-test: cd bruno/puris-integration-test && bru run --exclude-tags admin,share-enablement-services --env INT
